artist: Author: The Moorish Orthodox Radio Crusade Collective; Publisher: The Libertarian Book Club, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photographic image of a group of costume-wearing figures framed by abstract designs, with letterpress text, printed in offset lithography on beige wove paper covers; 40 pp.
title: Radio Sermonettes
